item.title: 052: Intuitive Astrology 101 with Danielle Paige
item.itunes:title: 052: Intuitive Astrology 101 with Danielle Paige
item.description:
Have you ever wondered WTF was going on in the stars and how to TRULY read an astrological chart? Then this episode is for you! I sit down with intuitive astrologer Danielle Paige of @HealingPaige to discuss all things cosmic. We address: -How to read your chart -Why your north and south nodes are SUPER important and have to do with your Dharma (life purpose) and past lives -How to blend in intuition with astrology -How to see if you are compatible with someone from your charts -Her views on the difference between a twin-flame and a soulmate -WHATS GOING ON IN THE WORLD! If you listened to Episode 50 We Are Waking Up: Transmission from the Cosmos and LOVED it, this episode is for you!

item.title: 051: Why Changing Your Schedule Will Change Your Life with Ayurveda Dr Suhas Kshirsagar
item.itunes:title: 051: Why Changing Your Schedule Will Change Your Life with Ayurveda Dr Suhas Kshirsagar
item.description:
In this weeks episode, I interview world-renown Ayurveda Doctor Suhas Kshirsagar, author of "Change Your Schedule, Change Your Life" and "Hot Belly Diet" both with foreword by Deepak Chopra. He is someone I have admired for many years with great knowledge about Ayurvedic wisdom and I am so honored to share this episode with you. In the interview we discuss: -The concept of digestion from an Ayurvedic perspective, the "agni" -Why our schedules are just as important as what we eat -The cause of agni from an Ayurvedic perspective -Why it's important to be mindful of who you are for your own health and wellbeing -Why food is sometimes overrated- it's only 1/5 of what we take in from an Ayurvedic perspective. -Why what we hear, see, smell and feel is just as important as what we eat -Why your dharma is the missing key to health -The cause of autoimmune disease from an Ayurvedic perspective -Why our overworking culture is making us ill and sleep is crucial for wellbeing - Check out his website: www.ayurvedichealing.net and order his book Change Your Schedule, Change Your Life. - We will be conducting a giveaway on my Instagram @IAmSaharaRose.

Brought to you by Four Sigmatic Mushroom Elixirs- Order Yours for 15% off on FourSigmatic.com/Sahara

In this weeks episode, I interview world-renown Ayurveda Doctor Suhas Kshirsagar, author of "Change Your Schedule, Change Your Life" and "Hot Belly Diet" both with foreword by Deepak Chopra. He is someone I have admired for many years with great knowledge about Ayurvedic wisdom and I am so honored to share this episode with you. In the interview we discuss: -The concept of digestion from an Ayurvedic perspective, the "agni" -Why our schedules are just as important as what we eat -The cause of agni from an Ayurvedic perspective -Why it's important to be mindful of who you are for your own health and wellbeing -Why food is sometimes overrated- it's only 1/5 of what we take in from an Ayurvedic perspective. -Why what we hear, see, smell and feel is just as important as what we eat -Why your dharma is the missing key to health -The cause of autoimmune disease from an Ayurvedic perspective -Why our overworking culture is making us ill and sleep is crucial for wellbeing - Check out his website: www.ayurvedichealing.net and order his book Change Your Schedule, Change Your Life. - We will be conducting a giveaway on my Instagram @IAmSaharaRose.

Brought to you by Four Sigmatic Mushroom Elixirs- Order Yours for 15% off on FourSigmatic.com/Sahara

This podcast was purely channeled from source energy-- cosmos -> thought -> podcast, all done and uploaded in real-time on the real-day because this is real life. I discuss: -What is going on from a cosmic perspective -How we are living in the microcosm of the macrocosm -Why the world woke up in 2012 -The shift from the patriarchal to the feminine era -The transition between being 5-dimensional to multi-dimensional human-beings -Accessing information from the Vortex -Why Donald Trump was elected from a metaphysical perspective -Uncovering your shadows -The spiritual perspective on bed-bugs -Meditation on accessing the lessons the universe is waiting for you to experience -Why connecting to Mother Earth is more important than ever before -Why you need to put your voice out there as a multidimensional being to transmute pain and darkness into healing and light Again, this episode isn't for everyone but if you are ready for this information, then I am honored to be a messenger of it for you. item.title: 048: Why You Need Medicinal Mushrooms In Your Life: Interview with Four Sigmatic Founder Tero
item.itunes:title: 048: Why You Need Medicinal Mushrooms In Your Life: Interview with Four Sigmatic Founder Tero
item.description:
Order your Four Sigmatic Mushroom Elixirs for 15% off at foursigmatic.com/sahara Tero is such a fun-gi! Ok I'll hold back on the mushroom jokes. If you've haven't heard of medicinal mushrooms yet, you are in for a real treat. They have countless health benefits from healing adrenals to increasing energy to reducing stress to fighting inflammation to balancing hormones and everything in between.

In this episode, we discuss: 1. What medicinal mushrooms are 2. Why Tero created Four Sigmatic to make mushroom consumption easier for people 3. How each mushroom has different benefits 4. If people with Candida can consume mushrooms (the answer is YES and he explaisn why) 5. Why mix mushrooms + coffee? 6. How to make the most out of your mushrooms And so much more! There is so mush-room to grow in the mushroom space! (Okay I'll stop now..)

Be sure to order your box at foursigmatic.com/sahara (I drink the reishi DAILY and my bf is obsessed with the coffee/ cordyceps.)

item.title: 047: Unveiling the Truth about Tantra with Chandresh Bharwaj
item.itunes:title: 047: Unveiling the Truth about Tantra with Chandresh Bharwaj
item.description:
Believe it or not, Tantra is MUCH more than a sexual practice. Tantra is an ancient Vedic science based on experiencing ALL human emotions—joy, anger, sexuality, sadness and everything in between. Nothing is considered good or bad—everything is just accepted as a part of us that can be channeled into source energy. I learned SO much about Tantra is in incredible episode with seventh generation Tantra expert and spiritual advisor Chandresh Bhardwaj, who is the author of “Break the Norms: Questioning Everything You Think You Know About God and Truth, Life and Death, Love and Sex” with foreword by His Holiness the Dalai Lama (amazing right?!)

We sat down in my home to discuss

-his journey from student in India to wall

-street broker in New York to spiritual advisor and meditation leader

-the truth about Tantra -the goddess Kali—and how she is so much more than just the Goddess of Destruction

-accepting your shadows

-how you hold onto your ancestors strengths and weaknesses

-what it’s like to have a guru for a Dad and Grandpa

-how NOT to put on pressure to on your kids to be a certain way -how he manifested the Dalai Lama writing the foreword to his book and so much more. We have SO much in common so if you like hearing from me, you’ll LOVE hearing from Chandresh! Learn more about him at http://cbmeditates.com/

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 046: Financial Self-Care- Why Abundance Is A Mindset We Need To Pay Attention To with Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 046: Financial Self-Care- Why Abundance Is A Mindset We Need To Pay Attention To with Sahara Rose
item.description:
What's keeping you back from living the life you want? For most of us, it's finances. In this episode, I get real with you. Money is the thing that's blocking most of us from having the freedom, education, wellness, travel experience, mental peace and opportunities we so badly desire. There is nothing "unspiritual" about talking about money-- in fact, in order to take care of ourselves and help others, we need it.

I share: 1. Why financial self-care needs to be part of our self-care routine 2. Exercise to go back to your oldest memory with money 3. MY oldest memory with money and why I learned young that if you want to choose the ice-cream flavor, you need the dough 4. Why abundance is a mindset 5. The laws of money and the things we are doing that are holding back our flow 6. Why spiritual people need to get more comfortable with thinking about their finances-- and how that's the very thing holding many of us back 7. Why playing small is keeping your impact small 8. The very big thing I did to celebrate my abundance and how it has forever changed my life (and the lives of others) Take your notepads out-- this episode is one you will want to relisten to!

Share your #financialselfcare practices on Instagram and tag @iamsahararose to be featured on my story!

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Sponsor a Cambodian child and make a life-changing difference in an entire family's life with cambodianchildrensfund.org

item.itunes:title: 045: Understanding Your Chakras From a Vedic Perspective with Sahara Rose
item.description:
You’ve heard about chakras but what do they really mean and how do we bring them back into balance? In this episode I discuss the chakras from an ancient Vedic perspective, how they can be both depleted or in excess and how they connect to the Doshas (mind-body types) and Koshas (layers outside of our body).

item.title: 041: How Leaving Everything and Moving to Bali Saved My Life with Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 041: How Leaving Everything and Moving to Bali Saved My Life with Sahara Rose
item.description:
Three and a half years ago, I realized I needed a radical life change. I didn’t have a career I loved, I didn’t have friendships who inspired me, I wasn’t in a relationship that fulfilled me, I didn’t have a true home or community. I knew there was more to life- that you could have all these things- but knew that I needed to make some major shifts to get there. So I bought a one-way ticket to Bali and this is what happened next to bring me where I am today.

Follow my journey to INDIA this month on Instagram @IAmSaharaRose

Stay tuned on my email list iamsahararose.com

5 Elements Shamanic Dance Activation Training: www.inmyelements.com Balinese Homestay: omunitybali.com

item.title: 040: Why Your Tribe Is the Key To Your Success- Interview with Lori Harder
item.itunes:title: 040: Why Your Tribe Is the Key To Your Success- Interview with Lori Harder
item.description:
We've all heard that you are a combination of the five people you spend the most time with. But how can you take those relationships and create rituals to bring you all to higher places? We discuss the power of tribe, the impact of mentorship, the ability of the mind and so much more in this juicy episode with Fitness Expert, Ted X Speaker and Podcast Host Lori Harder.

Be sure to check her podcast, Earn Your Happy, where she recently interviewed me!

Learn more about her loriharder.com @loriharder and participate in her Bliss Project event this March.

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 039: How to Cleanse the Ayurvedic Way (It's Not Juicing) With Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 039:How to Cleanse the Ayurvedic Way (It's Not Juicing) With Sahara Rose
item.description:
Ever went on a juice cleanse and ended up feeling like crap, then ended up gaining weight after? That's because it was too cooling on your digestive system and did not warm and ground your body, which is what prevents cravings. In this episode I discuss how to cleanse the Ayurvedic way and my modernized version of the Kitchari Cleanse.

Get My 3-Day Kitchari Cleanse Here: http://eatfeelfresh.com/kitcharicleanse

item.itunes:title: 038: Bridging Humor and Health With the Almost 30 Podcast Girls With Sahara Rose
item.description:
Join my Book Launch with Russell Simmons at Tantris Yoga Nov 19 in LA! There will be a yoga class, followed by a Cafe Gratitude vegan brunch, then meditation and Ayurveda lecture by me! Get your tickets here: tantris.com/studio/events/ I'm SO excited to interview the two amazing Almost 30 Podcast Girls, who interviewed me several months ago, for this fun episode!

We discuss

-starting and growing a podcast

-how to game-ify your life

-the transitions between your 20's and 30's

-various wellness scenes in LA

-balancing your hormones and so much more!

Check them out at www.almost30podcast.com @almost30podcast and Almond 30 Podcast on iTunes and Soundcloud! Enjoy the episode!

item.title: 037: Why We Spiritual People Need To Get Out Of Our Bubbles And Get Involved With Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 037: Why We Spiritual People Need To Get Out Of Our Bubbles And Get Involved With Sahara Rose
item.description:
It's time we get involved. We've drank our green juice, done our yoga, oiled our body.. Now let's cultivate that positive energy and go out there where it's needed. In this podcast episode, I explain what is going on in the world in a Vedic perspective and why we as spiritual people need to be the ones who help bring it back into balance. It's more than just sitting at home with your crystals and doing your meditation. It's fulfilling your dharma to help this planet. We cannot be afraid of politics because that's how the people who are ruled by hatred and ego take over.

This is a call to action to all my spiritual light warriors fueled by the power of love. Let's go out there and serve our Dharmas to truly become our highest selves.. which is far beyond the self.

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 036: Creating a Wellness Business With Your Bestie: Interview with Rock Your Bliss Movement Founders
item.itunes:title: 036: Creating a Wellness Business With Your Bestie: Interview with Rock Your Bliss Movement Founders
item.description:
Ever wondered what it would be like to create a business with your best-friend? This episode is for you! Life coach Jacki Carr and yoga teacher Mary-Beth Larue had a vision of creating a program to inspire women to rock their bliss, bringing a balance of sweaty yoga and meaningful conversation to the table.. and they pulled it off! Learn more about how they did it and the dynamics of cultivating a thriving business while maintaining a friendship and personal boundaries in this episode.

Find out more about them www.rockyourblissmovement.com.

item.title: 035: Understanding The Ayurvedic KOSHAS to Harness Intuition + Expand Consciousness With Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 035: Understanding The Ayurvedic KOSHAS to Harness Intuition + Expand Consciousness With Sahara Rose
item.description:
If you've read my book Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda, taken my quiz on iamsahararose.com, read my blog, follow me on Instagram or listen to my podcasts, you already know about the Ayurvedic Doshas (mind-body types). But what fewer people in the US know about are the KOSHAS, the layers OUTSIDE our bodies, which are just as important. In this episode, I discuss all about the Koshas and how we are essentially human radios, picking up on subtle frequencies that provide us with more information than our minds ever can.

I recommend listening to this episode with chapter 20 of my book Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda open because I explain it all in great depth in the book!

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 034: From Troubled Youth to Sought-After Traveling Yoga Teacher: Interview with Rosie Acosta
item.itunes:title: 034: From Troubled Youth to Sought-After Traveling Yoga Teacher: Interview with Rosie Acosta
item.description:
If you enjoyed episode #32 on the Need for Diversity and Affordability in Wellness you will LOVE this episode with yoga, meditation and self-love teacher Rosie Acosta. She shares her journey growing up in poverty stricken East LA during the riots surrounded by drug-use and violence and how she became her highest self, now touring with Yoga Journal teaching yoga across the country.

Be sure to check her out at www.radicallyloved.com @rosieacosta and listen to her podcast Radically Loved where she most recently interviewed me! Love this woman so much-- serious soul sister! We will be co-leading a Dance Your Doshas Ayurvedic Yoga + Dance workshop at Wanderlust this winter so be sure you are following both of us @iamsahararose and @rosieacosta to stay tuned! I also announced that I will be leading my Doshas + Dharma 4 Week Program again this Spring, my private mentorship program about finding your life purpose so if you'd like coaching from me and the support of a loving community, be sure to apply: https://eatfeelfresh.lpages.co/doshas-dharma-program/

Check out my blog posts, Dosha quiz, free gifts, book launch video and more at iamsahararose.com

Follow me along on Instagram @IAmSaharaRose If you haven't left a review on the iTunes store, it would be SO helpful to get this podcast out there so we can uplift the vibration of this world!

Leave your review here: itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/highest-self-podcast/id1244644906?mt=2

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 032: The Need For Diversity and Affordability in Wellness with Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 032: The Need For Diversity and Affordability in Wellness with Sahara Rose
item.description:
I talk some major truth in this podcast episode about a topic the universe has been reminding me to bring up.. the dire need to make wellness accessible to ALL. Part of being spiritual beings is care about the rest of the world. We can't ignore our brothers and sisters all across the country and planet who don't have access to the most basic health needs.

In this pretty fiery podcast episode, I discuss my personal experience as a volunteer teaching nutrition at A Place Called Home in South Central Los Angeles and how wellness education AND resource allocation is more needed than ever.

Volunteer in YOUR local community by searching on volunteermatch.org

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 031: Curing Cancer With Earth: Interview with Earth Diet Author Liana Werner-Gray
item.itunes:title: 031: Curing Cancer With Earth: Interview with Earth Diet Author Liana Werner-Gray
item.description:
Imagine you're a young 20-something girl, learning that you have a cancerous tumor in your neck. That's what happened to Liana Werner-Gray, who truly made her MESS her MESSAGE and healed her cancerous tumor through an EARTH-based diet.. and how now authored two book, The Earth Diet and 10 Minute Recipes with Hay House Publishing teaching you to do the same. I'm so excited to share this inspirational conversation with one of my dear friend Lianna Werner-Grey.

Find out more about her at http://www.theearthdiet.com/ and Instagram @theearthdiet and @lianawernergray.

Learn more about Ayurveda with me in my 12 week Eat Right For Your Mind-Body Type Guided Program: www.eatfeelfresh.com/guidedprogram

item.itunes:title: 030: Healing Ancestral Wounds- Why Some of the Stuff You're Dealing With Is Your Ancestors' With Sahara Rose
item.description:
This may sound like a totally foreign concept to you (it did when I first heard it) but not ALL the stuff you're dealing with is YOURS-- some of it has been passed on generationally from our ancestors. In this episode, I discuss my own personal ancestral baggage story that was holding me back from becoming my highest self. I then offer suggestions on how you can become aware of your ancestral wounds to heal them and finally become free.

Discover your Dosha, life purpose, so you can finally live the life you were meant to live and share your gifts on the planet through my Dosha + Dharma 4 Week Immersion Online Program with weekly Live Q+A's, Transformative Webinars and Soul-Opening Meditations. item.title: 029: Food Knowledge is Self Knowledge: Interview with Real Food Grocery Guide Author Maria Marlowe
item.itunes:title: 029: Food Knowledge is Self Knowledge: Interview with Real Food Grocery Guide Author Maria Marlowe
item.description:
Ever been confused walking around the aisles of a grocery store with NO idea what to buy because the labels are SO damn confusing? Then this episode is for you. One of my dear friends Real Food Grocery Guide Author Maria Marlowe breaks down all the food facts for us, from organic to non-gmo to natural to everything in between and shares her story of overcoming cystic acne through changing her diet.

Find Maria's book at https://www.amazon.com/Real-Food-Grocery-Guide-Ingredients/dp/1592337554/ and connect with her at MariaMarlowe.com @MariaMarlowe.

We are also creating a video series together called "Healthy Girl Problems" making fun of ourselves and the whole wellness culture so stay tuned on that on both of our Instagrams @iamsahararose and @mariamarlowe.

Thank you for spreading all this incredible information far and wide so we can be more empowered consumers, Maria!

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 027: It's Not The New-Age. It's the Now-Age. Interview with author Ruby Warrington of The Numinous
item.itunes:title: 027: It's Not The New-Age. It's the Now-Age. Interview with author Ruby Warrington of The Numinous
item.description:
In this interview, I sat down with my dear friend author Ruby Warrington of Material Girl, Mystical World. She is the founder of TheNuminous.com, an online magazine that bridges the gap between the mystical and the mainstream and co-founder of Moon Club, an online mentorship program for spiritual activists. We discussed all things from ayahuasca to soul mates vs twin-flames to what it means to be "sober-curious" in this incredible conversation and I am so glad to share it with you.

I will be hosting a workshop for the Moon Club on 8/29 so if you want a sneak peak of what it's like to be a Moon Club member, send an email to PR@EatFeelFresh.com with subject "Moon Club" so I can send you the info! Find Ruby on Instagram at @The_Numinous, www.thenuminous.com and her book Material Girl, Mystical World on Amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/Material-Girl-Mystical-World-High-Vibe/dp/0062437119

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.itunes:title: 026: The Difference Between Karma, Dharma and Kriya and Why It Matters With Sahara Rose
item.description:
We always hear the words karma, dharma and sometimes even kriya, but most of us don't know the TRUE meaning of these words. In this episode, I explain the actual meaning of the word karma (it's not "what goes around comes around"), dharma and kriya and why it's pivotal in your path towards of your higesht self.

item.itunes:title: 024: How To Become a Clear Channel to Access Your Past Lives with Sahara Rose
item.description:
The first time I've ever cried while recording a podcast episode. I share a recent dream I had, which was the most profound of my life and how you can connect with deceased relatives to learn more about yourself in your past and current lives. My true, vulnerable self really came out in this episode and I hope you can see that I am just a human on this journey of life as well. I love you, namaste.

I share a recent dream I had, which was the most profound of my life and how you can connect with deceased relatives to learn more about yourself in your past and current lives. My true, vulnerable self really came out in this episode and I hope you can see that I am just a human on this journey of life as well. I love you, namaste.

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.itunes:title: 019: Stages of a Woman's Evolvement- Part 1 With Sahara Rose
item.description:
Back from my travels in Formentera, South of France and Mykonos, Greece and couldn't be more excited to be back behind the mic sharing with you. My travels sparked the realization of how much I've changed (in a good way) which is what prompted me to record this episode about the stages of a woman's evolvement. item.title: 017: Creating an Authentic Social Media Brand Through Radical Self-Love with Olivia Ku
item.itunes:title: 017: Creating an Authentic Social Media Brand Through Radical Self-Love with Olivia Ku
item.description:
You may recognize Olivia as @LoveHealthOk, an Instagrammer and Youtuber that has over 1 million followers across her accounts and those that she created. Everything looked glamorous on the outside- huge deals with top food brands, a massively growing following.. Except one thing- she wasn't happy.

In this juicy podcast episodes, one of my BEST friends Olivia Ku shares how she let go of all the fame and followers to get REAL: first with herself, then with her fan-base. Now she's running her first retreat this July in LA all about self-love. Find out more details on her website lovehealthok.com and connect with her on Instagram.com/LoveHealthOk and Youtube.com/LoveHealthOk.

We will definitely be doing a webinar together all about overcoming eating disorders so stay tuned! Thank you Olivia for sharing your truth with us all- love you!

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 014: How I Manifested Working With Deepak Chopra and The Power of Meaningful Synchronicities With Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 014: How I Manifested Working With Deepak Chopra and The Power of Meaningful Synchronicities With Sahara Rose
item.description:
The episode that explains it all. How I met and now am collaborating with the biggest inspiration of my life, Deepak Chopra all through the discovering my dharma, the law of attraction, raising your vibration and most importantly, serving the needs of the planet. Every single person is our teacher-- our angels come in many shapes and forms. When your teacher shows up in the form of a homeless old man, will you still respect him as much as you do a famous author with over 85 books? I did and that's what led me to this incredible partnership.

This episode was recorded the day Deepak Ji asked me to join the faculty of his website Jiyo.com and since then, we've announced that we are leading the 31 Day Mind-Body Transformation Challenge together starting July 8 up until my book launch August 8 so make sure you are following me on Instagram, Facebook and/or Twitter @IAmSaharaRose to join us! I'll post another podcast episode with more details about how you can get involved. Believe in yourself and the universe will believe in you!

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

item.title: 012: Cured By Nature- How Tara Mackey Overcame Depression + Anxiety And Became a Best-Selling Author
item.itunes:title: 012: Cured By Nature- How Tara Mackey Overcame Depression + Anxiety And Became a Best-Selling Author
item.description:
My dear friend Tara Mackey is the true epitome of making your mess your message. She came off over a dozen psychiatric medications virtually overnight and decided she would heal her body with nature-- food, sun and meditation. She is now a best-selling author for her book Cured by Nature and blogs about natural beauty on her website theorganiclifeblog.com. This is such an inspirational interview where I learned even more about Tara and am further impressed by her incredible work-ethic and resilience. She is a true leader from a divine feminine space and I am so elated to share this interview with you.

Be sure to get her book: https://www.amazon.com/Cured-Nature-Inside-Happiness-Discover/dp/1634504011

Follow her on Instagram: instagram.com/taramackey

Join her Hua Hine retreat this August at theorganiclifeblog.com. ------------

Have you faced depression or anxiety and looking for ways to heal it naturally?

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Thank you Tara for this beautiful and inspirational interview!

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

item.title: 010: How The Hindu Goddesses Relate To the Ayurvedic Doshas with Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 010: How The Hindu Goddesses Relate To the Ayurvedic Doshas with Sahara Rose
item.description:
The word "goddess" is popping up more than ever before but few people know actually who these Goddesses are and what the represent. In this episode, I share the three Trifecta Hindu Goddesses, Saraswati, Durga and Lakshmi and how I've found they relate to the Ayurvedic Doshas- Vata, Pitta and Kapha. Hope you enjoy my findings!

Stay tuned for my photoshoot evoking each of the three Doshas which I'll be posting on my Instagram Instagram.com/IAmSaharaRose and Facebook.com/IAmSaharaRose Which Goddess/ Dosha do you relate to most? What about your mother? Your best friends?

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

item.title: 001: Who Is Your Highest Self? Intro to the Highest Self Podcast with Sahara Rose
item.itunes:title: 001: Who Is Your Highest Self? Intro to the Highest Self Podcast with Sahara Rose
item.description:
Welcome to the Highest Self Podcast, a place where we discuss what makes you your highest evolvement. My name is Sahara Rose, I'm the best-selling author of Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda and have been called "a leading voice in the millennial generation into the new paradigm shift" by Deepak Chopra. In this podcast, I will help you Discover Your Dharma so you can embody your fullest expression on the planet. Welcome and namaste.

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose
